title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Mar 22 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Mar 22 2022
description:
NYC Mayor Eric Adams says 2- to 4 year-old children have option not to wear masks as of April 4 if caseloads stay low. Austria brings back mask mandates. Covid-madman Fauci: "We have to be prepared to pivot and perhaps reinstitute some of those restrictions." Kid Rock shares his popular opinion on Fauci and drives "Let’s Go Brandon" Rolls Royce. Disney employees protest to force company to oppose Florida "anti-grooming" laws. Shannon Bream of Fox News joins Clay and Buck to discuss the Ketanji Brown Jackson confirmation hearing. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
